Articles.Content:
Anyone have any pics or craft files for a descent cargo plane with KAS winches for securing cargo? Larger the better. Ill turn this into a showcase thread as soon as I find a pic.

I'm just looking for ideas people have come up with for transporting through thr atmosphere heavy loads. Our gaming group has a need for one, so craft files would be appreciated.

Here is what I made on the gaming server before .90:

Cargo Airlifter III

![fK8PKE2.png](http://i.imgur.com/fK8PKE2.png)

I used it to transport anything I could winch to it. Winched above is the UtilityCat truck I designed. Very useful truck. The airlifter was even more so. I could carry a large tonnage with it winched in, which I used to transport various bases, and modules, and Karbonite mining rigs with. Beautiful and capable drone cargo plane, but ugly as all get out. I know I can do better. I just need ideas to uh... borrow.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T23:08:50Z" title="03/18/2015 11:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by inigma**

For all the SSTO needs:

For all the atmo needs:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/JQc9M)

This one is pretty basic. Just a scaled down Mriya. All they need is an airstrip to land on and a KAS winch inside of their bellies.
